pageTitle: Prime Minister Justin Trudeau meets with Chief Minister Devendra Fadnavis of Maharashtra | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Today, Prime Minister Trudeau met with the Chief Minister of Maharashtra, Mr. Devendra Fadnavis in Mumbai.  

The two discussed the vibrant and growing commercial relationship between Canada and India. They exchanged views on innovation, technology and growing Canada-India partnerships to promote mutual growth and investment. 

The Prime Minister discussed the Chief Ministerâ€™s ambitions under Smart Cities India and ways that Canadian business partnerships can contribute to developing citizen friendly and environmentally viable cities.  

They also agreed on the importance of inclusion, diversity, and respect for human rights and freedom of expression.
